title: At-tension!
short: Tension begins

title: The Build
short: Tension builds

title: The Ratchet
short: Tension builds even more

title: Another Notch
short: Tension ratchets up another notch

title: Jaw Dropper
short: Something extraordinary/astonishing happens

title: Friend Or Fist
short: Hero or ally bond or fight

title: Friend or Fist 2
short: Hero and/or ally bond or fight more

title: Something Startling Happens
short: A startling event occurs

title: The Pursuit
short: Hero discovers something extraordinary/astonishing that must be pursued

title: The Discussion
short: Someone important to the hero wants to discuss something significant

title: The Warning
short: Warning or threat is made

title: Harsher Warning
short: Harsher warning or threat is made

title: The Submission
short: Final warning/threat is made and the hero submits

title: Danger Watch
short: Docile hero watches danger approaching

title: Whew, That Was Close!
short: Hero experiences a close call while danger approaches

title: The Big Concern
short: Something causes deep concern for the hero or ally

title: World Upside Down
short: Bad guy turns a good person's world upside down

title: Trouble Turn
short: The event that will get the hero into trouble later

title: The Threat
short: Bad guy, or secondary bad guys, make a threat/warning

title: Push Back
short: The hero pushes back in some way

title: The Great Effect
short: Something happens that greatly impacts the hero

title: Truth Declared
short: A truth is stated

title: Scary Stuff
short: Hero experiences something scary with ally or love interest

title: Scary Stuff 2
short: Hero and/or ally/love interest experience more scary stuff

title: Scary Stuff 3
short: Hero and/or ally/love interest experience even more scary stuff

title: The Big Unexpected
short: Something big and unexpected occurs

title: The Mini-Quest
short: A Mini-Quest happens just before the Big Quest

title: Big Quest Prep
short: Hero prepares for the bigger quest with ally

title: Big Quest Prep 2
short: Hero and/or ally's preparation for bigger quest continues

title: The Need
short: A need is shown or expressed

title: Distress Signal
short: Hero sees/hear something that distresses him

title: Anxiety Amp
short: Sought-after truth or object is revealed and causes great anxiety

title: Ominous
short: Hero sees/does/hears something ominous

title: Friend Effect
short: Ally's behavior impacts the hero

title: Bait And Switch
short: Seems like this new world is positive, but is it really?

title: Hide And Seek
short: Main object of desire stays hidden

title: Over His Head
short: Hero or Ally realizes he may be in over his head

title: Positive Reconnect
short: Hero reconnects with ally in a positive way

title: New Journey Bond
short: Hero bonds further with main ally on new journey

title: Ally's World
short: We learn more about the ally and their world

title: Thorny Rose
short: Things may seem kinda rosy, but there's still ugliness out there

title: Suprise Reveal
short: Ally/Hero reveals something surprising

title: Surprise Reveal 2
short: Ally reveals something even more surprising

title: New News
short: Hero reacts to new news

title: Out Of The Ordinary
short: Hero does something brave and out of the ordinary for him

title: The Revelation
short: Something significant is revealed

title: The Escort
short: Ally takes, or will take, the hero somewhere

title: Needed Knowledge
short: Ally gives/shows hero need knowledge

title: Foreboding Fact
short: Hero is given more knowledge/warning, often ominous

title: The Portent
short: Something potentially deadly is seen or explained

title: The Engage
short: Hero and/or ally engage the enemy, the enemy intimidates the hero

title: Say Uncle
short: Pressure is applied to the hero or ally

title: The Intimidation
short: Enemy intimidates hero

title: The Lightbulb
short: New positive or negative revelation is made

title: Sideswipe
short: The hero or ally is sideswiped in some way, either positively or negatively

title: Dark Twist Chat
short: Hero talks with a friend, and then there's a dark twist

title: Difficult Words
short: Difficult question/request/statement is asked/made

title: Vital Event
short: A vital event happens to the hero or ally

title: The Deception
short: A deceit occurs

title: The Shocker
short: Something shocks the hero or ally

title: Plus Minus
short: A positive turns into a negative, or a negative turns into a positive

title: Flirtin' With Disaster
short: Hero or ally experiences something potentially disastrous

title: Ally Attack
short: Bad guy, or secondary bad guy, deeply affects hero's ally or love interest

title: Bad Guy Threat
short: Bad Guy, or secondary bad guy, threatens hero in some way

title: The Resistance
short: Hero or ally attacks/resists the bad guy

title: Positive Step
short: Hero does something positive toward his goal

title: Hero Effect
short: Hero does something that will immediately or eventually impact the main bad guy

title: Ally Aid
short: Ally or love interest takes a positive/significant step toward hero

title: Captivating Concern
short: Something is seen, heard, or experienced that cause great concern

title: New Journey
short: The hero, ally, or bad guy embarks on a new journey

title: Bad To The Bone
short: Bad guy, or secondary bad guy, shows aggression

title: Badder To The Bone
short: Bad guy, or secondary bad guys, shows more aggression

title: Baddest To The Bone
short: Bad guy, or secondary bad guys, ratchet up aggression even more

title: Put Into Peril
short: Hero and/or ally is put into peril

title: Skull And Crossbones
short: Death or destruction is expressed or threatened

title: Death Tap
short: Death or destruction, or their threat, is escalated

title: The Rumble
short: A fight, argument, or violent act occurs

title: Mystery Mission
short: Hero and ally interact; there's a mystery that needs to be solved

title: Mystery Mission 2
short: Hero and/or ally continue to engage/interact; more mystery

title: Tick Tick Boom
short: An emotional or physical explosion occurs

title: Surprised Hero
short: Bad guy or ally surprises hero

title: Surprise- Surprise
short: Another quick surprise happens

title: Gotta Go!
short: Hero hurries somewhere

title: Gap Subtract
short: Gap between hero and bad guy/ally decreases

title: Bad Guy Boo-Boo
short: Bad guy is hurt

title: Worry Wound
short: Hero or ally is wounded in some way

title: Damage done
short: Bad guy provokes physical or emotional damage

title: Double Damage Done
short: Bad guy causes additional physical emotional

title: Red Alert!
short: Circumstances grow more serious for hero

title: Rescuing Ally
short: Ally helps the hero

title: Suffer The Weak
short: Hero or ally expresses weakness

title: Hugs and Kisses
short: Hero ally/love interest show affection

title: Hugs and Kisses 2
short: Hero and ally express even greater affection

title: The Aggressor
short: Hero or bad guy shows aggression

title: The Seperation
short: Hero and ally seperate

title: Death and Dying
short: Some kind of death is shown or expressed

title: Taping The Knuckles
short: Hero prepares for, or heads toward, the battle place

title: Kiss Or Spit
short: Hero or bad guy shows aggression/affection

title: Kiss Or Spit 2
short: Hero or bad guy shows even more aggression/affection

title: Kiss Or Spit 3
short: Hero and/or bad guy show even greater aggression/affection

title: Deeper Deeper
short: Hero heads deeper into trouble

title: The Blow-Up
short: There's an emotional or physical blow-up

title: The Blow
short: Hero or bad guy administers some sort of blow

title: The Upper Hand
short: Hero or bad guy gets the upper hand in an aggressive manner

title: The Deceit
short: Deceit is shown or expressed

title: The Dodge
short: Someone dodges or avoids something

title: Good Does Bad
short: Someone that seems good does bad

title: Sense Of Finality
short: Finality is shown or expressed

title: The Extraordinary
short: Something extraordinary is revealed

title: Strong Statement
short: Someone makes a strong statement, either verbally or physically

title: Turn For The Worse
short: Things take a turn for the worse for the hero

title: Charging Shark
short: Bad guy takes aggressive action toward hero and ally

title: The Cage Slam
short: Bad guy takes another aggressive action toward hero and allies

title: Gets The Better
short: Bad guy gets the better of hero and/or ally

title: Bleak Meek
short: Things seem bleak for the hero

title: Kick 'Em While They're Down
short: Bad guy exerts tremendous effort against hero

title: The Reprieve
short: Looks really, really bleak for hero, but hero does something that might save him

title: Hope Might Be Lost
short: Hope might be lost for good for the hero

title: One Bullet Left
short: Hero fails, or needs help, as the bad guy closes in

title: Powder Keg
short: There's an emotional or physical explosion
